Author: swirlturls
Text: i had all my calories worked out literally perfectly. i count weekly and had eaten over my limit for the week by 1701. so i minused that from THIS weeks calories and had a very careful deficit just below maintanence that would allow me to drink when im away without panicking quite as much (lets be real plans don't work some times haha :)). but anyways i was basically \~forced\~ or strongly encouraged or pressured to eat over 1000 extra cals of sushi so now my calories are all out of whack. i wanted to lose but i am calculating for complete maintenance now because i dont think i can keep heavily restricting. but i already am HAHA because i had to minus the 1701 cals and that doesn't seem like that but i ate too much the week BEFORE and had to do the same thing with 2000 cals (over logged but still i HAVE to) so now it is all adding up and im very upset and dont even want to eat at all tomorrow.
